# 9.0 Docs

> Documentation for 9.0 Docs.

*Topics available: 1*

- [Breaking change: Deprecated desktop Windows/macOS/Linux MonoVM runtime packages](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/deployment/9.0/monovm-packages.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 9 where the desktop Windows, macOS, and Linux MonoVM runtime packages are deprecated.
